title: Understanding the Scenario
text: In this scenario, the pharmaceutical company is interested in determining the amount of a specific substance in a drug. Think about what type of analysis focuses on measuring quantities.

title: Types of Analysis
text:
Recall the different types of analysis:
- Qualitative analysis identifies what substances are present.
- Quantitative analysis measures how much of a substance is present.
- Characterization provides detailed information about the structure or properties of a substance.
- Fundamental analysis involves understanding the underlying principles of a chemical process.

title: Focus on Quantitative Analysis
text: Quantitative analysis is used when the goal is to determine the concentration or amount of a substance in a sample. This is often done using techniques like titration, spectrophotometry, or chromatography.
